sections.heading: improvements and growing crops of lessee; appraisers; fee
sections.text: The appraisers shall receive a reasonable fee, not to exceed fifty dollars each, for their services, to be fixed by the county judge, and the same shall be taxed to the lessee.SourceLaws 1967, c. 467, ยง 11, p. 1454;Laws 1969, c. 589, ยง 2, p.
